name: New Messenger 2020
description: You dont have much time to care about families and friends ... Let New Messenger 2020 be the person who sends love messages and connects you with them .  New Messenger 2020 is a free , simplet and fast app which can help you manager all your messenger . Besides , you can easily chat with family and friends .  With New Messenger 2020 , you just need one click to open your messenger app whenever you want to have a message by you friends and families , show you the times of each messager app ... Features for Messenger App as below : SMS & MMS : you can easily receive ,read, send and forward text messages. We also support MMS such us picture , audio and video messages. Group messaging : Add multipe contacts to the message to enter group messaging mode Blocked Contacts SMS , MMS . Delete Message: Conveniently delete useless messages. Dual SIM: Support two SIM . Handles you message.  Mute Notifications : Mute unwanted message notifications. Add contacts via messages : Add new numbert to current/new contacts . Quich Dial: Reply other by calls after you read the messages . Do you want more SMS themes free for Android With many different topics such as:  +) Theme Messenger For SMS, Theme Dark Mode,Theme Rain, etc ... +) You can also create separate themes to your liking +) Design - Stylish conversation interface +) Custom Colorful Bubble Chat :With many great options to make your conversation less boring +)Font amazing :There are over 500+ fonts for your application New Messenger Version 2020 is a beautiful SMS app theme that will offer a fabulous look to your phone or tablet. If you pleasure us app ,please share with your friends and families .  Besides , Please give us a 5-start rating to support developer and you can any question for us . We will consider them for future updates if it is correctly . Many thanks for using this app.
